channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz helps founders meet compute needs with ‘Oxygen’ private GPU cluster
item.description: Andreessen Horowitz has a massive cluster of Nvidia H100 GPUs to help its portfolio of AI startups meet their compute needs, the venture capital firm ...

item.title: VCs love using the AI meeting notepad Granola, so they gave it $20M
item.description: Granola’s notepad app has become a popular tool among venture capitalists who use it to record meetings and augment notes using AI technology. That ma...

item.title: The Maker of Ozempic Is Trying to Block Compounded Versions of Its Blockbuster Drug
item.description: Novo Nordisk has asked the FDA to block production of compounded copies of Ozempic, arguing that it’s too difficult to do safely. It’s the latest esca...

item.title: Best iPad to Buy (and Some to Avoid) in 2024
item.description: New iPads are here. We break down the current lineup to help you figure out which one of Apple’s tablets is best for you.

item.title: The Eero Outdoor 7 Brings Wi-Fi to the Backyard
item.description: Amazon’s Eero unveils the weatherproof Outdoor 7 to extend Wi-Fi coverage across your property.

item.title: How to Fly With a Personal Item—Plus Our 3 Favorite Small Bags (2024)
item.description: Maximize your travel enjoyment while minimizing your stuff by flying with only one small bag.

item.title: Nigeria Drops Charges Against Tigran Gambaryan, Jailed Binance Exec and Former IRS Agent
item.description: After eight months, one of the US's most prominent crypto-crime investigators may finally be coming home.

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 full Roundtable Session agenda

item.title: TikTok will now show its STEM feed to adults, not just teens
item.description: TikTok announced on Wednesday that it’s bringing its STEM feed to all users in the United States, United Kingdom, and Ireland by default. Previously, ...

item.title: 5 days to go: TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 kicks off and ticket prices go up
